column4:
i am trying to host a web site, but there is a firewall on my ubuntu box, how do i disable it?
2007-10-08T10:44:00.000Z	dxdt	BillyBeans	unless you put one there, there is no firewall by default.
2007-10-08T10:44:00.000Z	dxdt	BillyBeans	you may simply want to check to make sure your web server software, probably apache, is listening and such.
2007-10-08T10:44:00.000Z	dxdt	BillyBeans	ahh then yeah do what nickrud says
